thread.title: Dream to make India $20 trillion economy: Narendra Modi - newsR
thread.title_full: Dream to make India $20 trillion economy: Narendra Modi - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Dream to make India $20 trillion economy: Narendra Modi - newsR
text: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday said he dreamt of making India a $20 trillion economy and that he was pleasantly surprised by the change of perception about his country in a short period of time. Attending a question and answer ‘town-hall’ session with Facebook chief Mark Zuckerberg at their office at Hackers Square here, the prime minister also said a lot had to be done to bridge the digital divide in India. ”We are an $8 trillion economy today. My dream is for India to become a $20 trillion dollar economy,” Modi said, adding: “Amazing, how perception about India has changed in a very short time. We have brought in a new level of confidence.” Zuckerberg said India was personally »
